original: “Tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca deva,
analyzed: tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca deva
ajjā iva tvam kuru ūnam hohi rājā
kin nu udha deva tavam atthi bhogāḥ

original: Bhuttā ca me bhogā tidivasmiṁ deva,
analyzed: bhuttā ca me bhogā tidivasmim deva
alasaḥ gihī kāma bhogī na sādhu

original: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṁ na sādhu.
analyzed: yaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kodhanaḥ tam na sādhu
putto tava ayam taruṇaḥ su dhamme
bahu ssutāḥ ye bahu ṭhāna cintinaḥ
appossukkā vīta sokā su dhammā ati
